name: Hellenic Environmental Center S.A.
bossPosition: President of the Board of Directors
goal:
Our company undertakes the collection, transport and treatment of oil residues originating from ships and land-based units (industrial, shipbuilding, etc). As a leading Port Reception Facilities provider, during the past three decades, our company has established a pioneering and dynamic role in the protection of the marine environment, providing exemplary quality services worldwide. We have collected and treated tens of millions of tons of ship-generated and industrial oily waste, thus contributing significantly to the global marine environmental protection. Our vision strategic core values and principles are:
 Environment is one of the most significant pillars of global economy; a sensitive sector that only companies with value, duration and integrity can last with success.
 We think ahead and aim not only to be satisfactory for the present, but also be proactive for the future and develop all the necessary tools and know-how to determine a better prospect.
 Building a legacy in the environmental sector is a synonym of setting a paradigm for the industry, for other companies, for the political and economic system; as well as showcasing the ecological economy as a leading force of sustainability for the future.
interests: Business and Industry, Environment, Maritime affairs and fisheries
euInitiatives:
